comment.author: 12779052@N00
comment._content: Fantastic photo - I really like the pin on her vest!

comment.author: 21891888@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Face Time, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group. this would make a wonderful contribution to facetime.

comment.author: 9341577@N08
comment._content: Wow! The old black & white photos that we mostly see of this era don't convey the beauty of people in that time. She's a beauty. I wish women today took care to dress up like this before they go into work.

comment.author: 19927186@N00
comment._content: Thanks for putting up these photos, they are beautiful. I love this photographer's work.

comment.author: 10213344@N07
comment._content: Unusual wooden pin with red lips, might be african or carribean? It just reflects the red on her lips as well and against the red vest looks great.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: @ bf53490 -- click on the tag "Wooden Pin" to see other workers wearing this same pin. This woman is also in this set-up:

comment.author: 8950049@N07
comment._content: She reminds me of the photos of my great-grandmother when she was young.

comment.author: 30788785@N02
comment._content: Our GREATEST generation in full color!  My grandparents passed a couple of years back and I found a few pictures of my grandfather in his 1st Cavalry Division US Army Uniform and my grandmother kept to the day near her pillow from WWII. These pictures are a treasure!! Thank you so much for sharing them.
